transArray.content: Hello, dear guests, simple words, a few words, full of love, warm the hearts of our friends at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Although the encounter is short, the memories are eternal. I hope you will look back and be in a good mood every day. ! We will continue to work hard to live up to your trust! All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your every visit and wish you a happy life and smooth work!
